amused.translation[0].definitions[0].def: if you are amused by something, you think it is funny and you smile or laugh
amused.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: I could see she was highly amused  (=very amused).
The man looked a little amused.
He won’t be very amused  (=he will be annoyed) when he finds out what’s happened to his garden.
Ellen seemed amused by the whole situation.
